settings.title: Standout Packaging for Smart Brands
settings.subtitle: We help authentic companies thrive in a crowded marketplace through eco-friendly packaging that gets noticed, elevates the unboxing experience, and sells more product. Command attention worthy of your brand.

settings.description:
• 1000+ pcs minimum order quantity
  • 6+ week production time
  • Any size, color, finish, or style
  • Advanced customization

• No minimum order
  • In stock and ready to ship
  • Shop pre-made sizes and colors
  • Blank or screen printed

settings.title: Trusted by Global Brands & Local Artisans
Custom Tubes
settings.subtitle:
+ 1000 pcs minimum order quantity
+ Custom-made with longer lead times
+ Any size, color, finish, or style
+ Advanced customization

settings.title: Ready-Made Tubes
settings.subtitle:
+ No minimum order
+ In stock and ready to ship
+ Choose from pre-made sizes and colors
+ Blank or screen printed

settings.title: Get Inspired
settings.subtitle: Helping our customers think outside the box since 2013. From start-ups to major agencies, our tubes are universally admired.

settings.title: Ready to start?
settings.subtitle: Explore endless customization in any size, color, and style. Limited only by your imagination (and minimum order quantity).

settings.heading: Command Attention
settings.content: Change shape and stand out amongst the boxes. Make that first impression a lasting one.

settings.heading: Better Product Experience
settings.content: Finally, packaging worthy of your product. Enhance the unboxing experience. Sell more!

settings.heading: Earth-Friendly
settings.content:
100% recyclable and 110% reusable, a win-win for everyone. Lead the pack of the eco-conscious forefront.

We have partnered withÂ One Tree PlantedÂ as part of our commitment to sustainability. A portion of our proceeds goes towards global reforestation.Â $1 = 1 tree ðŸŒ².

settings.banner_description: Packaging matters. Our stock paper tubes are perfect retail packaging and shipping companions for your products, with screen-printing customization available.

settings.title: Command Attention
settings.text: Itâ€™s a fact. Packaging is part of the product experience. Stand out. Get noticed. Sell more product!

settings.title: Endless Customization
settings.text: Luxury products deserve luxury packaging. Built from scratch and uniquely yours. Any size, color, and style. Limited only by your imagination.

settings.title: Earth-Friendly
settings.text: Packaging that can be reused or recycled is a win-win. Upgrade to paper tubes. Reduce your ecological footprint.

settings.request_label: Need customization or ordering over 1000 pieces? Request a quote.
settings.custom_quote_label: Design and production can take up to X weeks

settings.title: Trusted by Global Brands & Local Artisans

settings.testimonial: "We saw an ad the Paper Tube Co. was running online that said, 'For When Packaging Matters' and that turned out to be a home run statement. We checked out their website and it was clear these guys get it. And what's more, not only did they help us with the packaging design, they engineered a unique insert that displays the product almost like jewelry and actually demonstrates how to use the product, just by un-packaging it! "

"After reaching out to all of our usual paper vendors to create a tube package for a dog CBD company we all but gave up. It was going to be too expensive and require ridiculously long overseas lead times. But then we happened to find Paper Tube Co. on Instagram, and they saved our project! Every step of working with them was pain free and we ended up with a beautiful tube with tons of (usually very expensive) finishing techniques! Weâ€™ll definitely be back to order more. Thanks guys!"

â€œPaper Tube Co. team was responsive, professional, talented, and paid attention to the details. Their systems were seamless and they worked hard with us as we problem-solved how to make our packaging functional and beautiful.â€

"We saw an ad the Paper Tube Co. was running online that said, 'For When Packaging Matters' and that turned out to be a home run statement. We checked out their website and it was clear these guys get it. And what's more, not only did they help us with the packaging design, they engineered a unique insert that displays the product almost like jewelry and actually demonstrates how to use the product, just by un-packaging it! "

settings.list-item: Made to your exact specifications in any size, color, or style

settings.heading: It's quick and easy. Everyone's doing it.
settings.description:
Letâ€™s work together to ensure that whatâ€™s on the outside reflects the innovation and care of whatâ€™s on the inside. Your dedicated packaging consultant will be in touch shortly.


Can't wait for custom tubes? Shop Ready-Made.Â Questions? Visit our FAQ.Â

settings.title: Reusable Deodorant + Plastic-Free Refill Cartridges
settings.text: Looking for a way to show environmentally-conscious customers you care? Introducing a recyclable, refillable alternative to wasteful plastic deodorant tubes.

settings.title: EcoVaultÂ® Paper Bottle
settings.text: Approximately 4.79 billion retail prescriptions will be filled this year, most using child-proof plastic bottles. Add to that the excessive packaging often used to keep cannabis safe and fresh and youâ€™ve got an astronomical number of opportunities for retailers to pivot toward a more sustainable choice. Thankfully, the Paper Tube Co. research and development team has created an eco-friendly solution.

settings.title: Bird Rock Coffee Roasters
settings.text: Making your packaging stand out on shelves is vital in the massive coffee industry. See how Bird Rock Coffee Roasters fused their branding with paper tubes for a successful specialty campaign.

settings.title: Moon Dust
settings.text: Packaging so eco-friendly it's out of this world. All of the glam and glitter of the beauty industry, without any of the plastic. Check out how our in-house beauty kit made it work.

settings.title: Wildflower Caramel Co.
settings.text: With the help of screen printing and labels, Wildflower Caramel turned ready-made kraft tubes into their own custom gift tubes for their delicious, handmade treats.Â

settings.title: Talnua
settings.text: The top shelf of the distilled spirits retail section is a tough place for any retail distributor to stand out in. That's why Talnua Distillery turned to us for a solution to stand above all the others. Our auto-tucking folding boxes, provided a luxurious, but still affordable packaging solution for their limited edition Olde Saint's Keep Collection.

settings.title: Diem CBD
settings.text: Vibrant colors and artwork fill every corner of Diem CBDâ€™s tube design, which attracts consumer attention while shopping the ever-expanding, competitive CBD market.

settings.title: S.V Ditto
settings.text: High end jewelry deserves luxury packaging to match. We developed a sleek and smooth gift box for S.V Ditto's jewelry collection. A magnetic folding flap compliments the elegance and class of the jewelry found inside.

settings.title: Blocki Perfume Co.
settings.text: Fine fragrances deserve quality packaging. We helped Blocki present their savor by creating high-end custom tubes that complimented their artisanal brand and made sure the product stood out on the shelf and in the mailbox. At the same time, we engineered a custom foam insert to secure their glass spray bottle, ensuring that the fragrance would arrive undamaged.

settings.title: Tono & Co.
settings.text: Silk deserves to break free from square boxes and shapeless bags. Tono & Co gave their luxurious scarves an equally luxurious home in paper tubes, including a die-cut preview of the productâ€™s color and texture.Â

settings.title: Custom Tubes More Your Style?
settings.subtitle: Need more than 1000 tubes? Explore endless customization in any size, color, and style. Limited only by your imagination.

settings.title: Have a Question?
settings.text: If you’re not sure that your product will fit, what sizes and options are available, or if we ship to your country, you can find answers to all of those questions, and more, here.

settings.paragraph_content:
The coffee industry is vast, spanning global markets filled with ever-evolving trends and experimental beverages. The options are limitless for consumers, which means making a name for yourself can be challenging. The very first aspect coffee shoppers see is, lo and behold, packaging. Whether it be online, on the shelf at their local grocery store, or in their favorite cafe, packaging matters. Bird Rock Coffee Roasters gave tubes a go for a few of their unique batches of beans. These offerings are premium quality, and they wanted their packaging to match.

Bird Rock's coffee is normally sold in beautiful blue bags that have become synonymous with their name. Keeping with the same brand colors and design, they gave their tubes an added flair including artwork and hidden features meant for buyers’ eyes. This added elevation gives exponential value to their specialty roasts, and only enhances their line of coffee products. A beautiful color palette, captivating artwork, and quality tube packaging gave them that desired competitive edge in order to stand out.

â—† Custom 2-Piece Tube with Over-Cap
â—† Rolled Edges Top & Bottom
â—† Kraft Paper Wrap + Spiral Kraft Core
â—† Matte Varnish
â—† Spot Color Pantone Printing
â—† Full Bleed Artwork

8 oz Whole Bean Coffee: 7” x 3” Inner Dimensions

settings.title: Ready to start?
settings.subtitle: Explore endless customization in any size, color, and style. Limited only by your imagination.

settings.title: What size tubes do you sell?
settings.subtitle:
We can produce tubes in any size, depending on the quantity you need.

All of our ready-made tube sizes are available in stock for quick delivery. You can order them blank in any quantity directly on our website. At 1000+ pcs we can produce any ready-made tube size with full color printing.

If the size you want is not stocked or if you need us to engineer a perfect product fit, we can custom-make any tube dimensions. Because of setup time and costs, there is a 1000 piece minimum order quantity for custom-made tubes.

settings.title: Are there different tube styles you can create?
settings.subtitle:
1-piece tubes with metal or plastic closures.

2-piece telescoping tubes where the cap fits on top of the base when the tube is closed. We can do straight or rolled edges on the top and bottom.

3-piece telescoping tubes where the cap fits on top of the â€œlipâ€ for a flush-fit look. These tubes can also have a rolled or straightÂ top and bottom edge.

settings.title: Are your tubes eco-friendly?
settings.subtitle:
The short answer is YES, but really, it depends on your definition of "eco-friendly". We would rather offer transparency over greenwashing.

All of our ready-made tubes are engineered to be reusable, recyclable, and biodegradable. They are made out of 100% virgin pulp paper and contain no plastic whatsoever.

For custom-made tubes, we will always steer you towards the most eco-conscious option while keeping functionality in mind. If you're using tubes as secondary packaging and want to reduce your environmental impact, we suggest uncoated kraft or white paper with soy ink printing and varnish. If you need primary packaging that will have direct contact with food or packaging that will be used and stored in a moisture-prone environment, it's almost impossible to completely eliminate plastic from outer lamination or the inner liner that ensures shelf life and oil-resistance. With that said, we are always exploring different natural materials, like soy inks, biodegradable lamination, and greaseproof paper inner lining for solid cosmetics products, like lip balms and deodorants.

Regarding compostability...while we have not done actual compostability testing, we have engaged with several accredited laboratories and spoken to material scientists. In a nutshell, compostability testing is an 8-month / $20K endeavor that, according to everyone we spoke with, may not prove fruitful. Tubes have a pretty thick spiral wrapped core which may or may not break down to the extent necessary within the required period of time. Given that the tubes are plastic-free and use minimal additives, they will eventually break down (thus being labeled biodegradable), we just don't know if they'll meet the criteria for an officialÂ compostabilityÂ claim unless we spend the time and money for the test. Regardless of this, we will work with you to ensure your tube packaging has the smallest ecological footprint. We're also happy to work with you on the testing, if you choose to do it yourself.

For more details about sustainability, see our blog.

settings.title: Are your tubes food grade/food safe?
settings.subtitle:
Our ready-made blank tubes are safe for dry goods that don't require shelf-life sustainability. Many of our customers use them for tea and other dry food products, though we always recommend putting the product in a sealed bag and using the tubes as secondary outer packaging.

We can produce completely custom tubes with aluminum foil and PE lining which create a food-safe, oil-resistant inner barrier. Those tubes are generally sealed after filling to make them air-tight. Sealing can be done using metal discs, which requires specialized equipment, or shrink wrapping. Minimum order quantity is 2500 pcs. Alternatively, you can package your product in a sealed bag before putting them into the tubes for additional food-safety and to retain longer shelf life.

settings.title: Do you make push-up tubes for cosmetics/lip balm/deodorant/etc.?
settings.subtitle:
Yes, we offer ready-made push-up tubes with a free-moving bottom disc featuring oil-resistant wax paper lining for cosmetic and skincare products. Additionally, we can create custom push-up tubes built to your specifications. Minimum order quantity for custom push-up tubes is 2500 pcs.

We recommend you test your product with aÂ fewÂ samples before committing to a larger quantity. Push-up tubes may not work with all products.

settings.title: What size tubes do you sell?
settings.subtitle:
We can produce tubes in any size, depending on the quantity you need.

All of our ready-made tube sizes are available in stock for quick delivery. You can order them blank in any quantity directly on our website. At 1000+ pcs we can produce any ready-made tube size with full color printing.

If the size you want is not stocked or if you need us to engineer a perfect product fit, we can custom-make any tube dimensions. Because of setup time and costs, there is a 2500 piece minimum order quantity for custom-made tubes.

settings.title: How do I know which tube size fits my product?
settings.subtitle:
Product sizes vary. Thatâ€™s why we always keep a variety of tube sizes in stock. You can send us your product(s) and we will engineer the perfectÂ custom tube as long as your minimum order quantity is 2500 pcs, or recommend one of ourÂ ready-made sizes for smaller orders. Below are some loose guidelines for the most popular product categories we work with.

Coffee Beans
â€“ 4â€³ H x 3â€³ D (4 oz)
â€“ 4â€³ H x 3.5â€³ D (4 oz)
â€“ 4.5â€³ H x 3â€³ D (4 oz)
â€“ 4.5â€³ H x 3.25â€³ D (4 oz)
â€“ 5â€³ H x 3â€³ D (4 oz)
â€“ 6.5â€³ H x 3.25â€³ D (8 oz)
â€“ 8.5â€³ H x 3.75â€³ D (12 oz)
â€“ 10â€³ H x 3.5â€³ D (12 oz)

T-Shirts
â€“ 6.5â€³ H x 3.25â€³ D
â€“ 8.5â€³ H x 3.75â€³ D
â€“ 10â€³ H x 3.5â€³ D

Boston Round Bottles
â€“ 3.66â€³ H x 1.18â€³ D (15ml)
â€“ 4.13â€³ H x 1.38â€³ D (30ml)
â€“ 4.72â€³ H x 1.69â€³ D (60ml)
â€“ 5.51â€³ H x 2.15â€³ D (120ml)

settings.title: Our product has an unusual shape. Can I still use paper tubes for packaging?
settings.subtitle: Probably yes. Part of what sets the Paper Tube Co. apart from the competition is that we provide industrial design and engineering to not only package your product, but to show it off with tube construction that may include inner tabs, blocked space, special inserts and more.

settings.title: Are there size constraints for custom tubes?
settings.subtitle: We get all kinds of requests, from custom paper straws to carpet cores. While the answer is YES most of the time, there are things weâ€™re not known for. We donâ€™t generally produce diameters smaller than 10mm. We also donâ€™t specialize in really thick cores for industrial applications. Our typical wall thicknesses range from 0.75mm to 2.5mm. Tubes that are longer than 15â€ or wider than 6â€ get really expensive to ship so expect some premium pricing if you need those. Let us know what you need and we shall assist.

settings.title: Are there different tube styles you can create?
settings.subtitle:
1-piece tubes with metal or plastic closures.

2-piece telescoping tubes where the cap fits on top of the base when the tube is closed. We can do straight or rolled edges on the top and bottom

3-piece telescoping tubes where the cap fits on top of the â€œlipâ€ for a flush-fit look. These tubes can also have a rolled or straightÂ top and bottom edge.

settings.title: Are your tubes eco-friendly?
settings.subtitle:
The short answer is YES, but really, it depends on your definition of "eco-friendly". We would rather offer transparency over greenwashing.

All of our ready-made tubes are engineered to be reusable, recyclable, and biodegradable. They are made out of 100% virgin pulp paper and contain no plastic whatsoever.

For custom-made tubes, we will always steer you towards the most eco-conscious option while keeping functionality in mind. If you're using tubes as secondary packaging and want to reduce your environmental impact, we suggest uncoated kraft or white paper with soy ink printing and varnish. If you need primary packaging that will have direct contact with food or packaging that will be used and stored in a moisture-prone environment, it's almost impossible to completely eliminate plastic from outer lamination or the inner liner that ensures shelf life and oil-resistance. With that said, we are always exploring different natural materials, like soy inks, biodegradable lamination, and greaseproof paper inner lining for solid cosmetics products, like lip balms and deodorants.

Regrading compostability...while we have not done actual compostability testing, we have engaged with several accredited laboratories and spoken to material scientists. In a nutshell, compostability testing is an 8-month / $20K endeavor that, according to everyone we spoke with, may not prove fruitful. Tubes have a pretty thick spiral wrapped core which may or may not break down to the extent necessary within the required period of time. Given that the tubes are plastic-free and use minimal additives, they will eventually break down (thus being labeled biodegradable), we just don't know if they'll meet the criteria for an officialÂ compostabilityÂ claim unless we spend the time and money for the test. Regardless of this, we will work with you to ensure your tube packaging has the smallest ecological footprint. We're also happy to work with you on the testing, if you choose to do it yourself.

For more details about sustainability, see our blog.

settings.title: Can I get tubes made with material other than paper?
settings.subtitle: Yes. We have a wide variety of materials besides coated and uncoated papers. We can make custom tubes using cloth, leather-like, metallic, textured, and specialty papers and laminates. Weâ€™ll advise which materials work best with the type of customization you desire.

settings.title: Are your tubes food grade/food safe?
settings.subtitle:
Our ready-made blank tubes are safe for dry goods that don't require shelf-life sustainability. Many of our customers use them for tea and other dry food products, though we always recommend putting the product in a sealed bag and using the tubes as secondary outer packaging.

We can produce completely custom tubes with aluminum foil and PE lining which create a food-safe, oil-resistant inner barrier. Those tubes are generally sealed after filling to make them air-tight. Sealing can be done using metal discs, which requires specialized equipment, or shrink wrapping. Minimum order quantity is 2500 pcs. Alternatively, you can package your product in a sealed bag before putting them into the tubes for additional food-safety and to retain longer shelf life.

settings.title: Can you make airtight tubes?
settings.subtitle: We can produce airtight composite paper cans with peelable membrane closures and inner foil lining. Your packaging and fulfillment partner would need to have proper equipment to seal the tubes after filling them with your product.Â

settings.title: Do you have child-resistant tube packaging?
settings.subtitle: Yes. WeÂ recently rolled out our patented EcoVaultâ„¢Â child-resistant paper tube packaging solution. Independent lab tested and CPSC compliant,Â EcoVaultâ„¢ï¸ features the same endless customization options as our regular paper tubes. For more information go to EcoVault.co

settings.title: Why do some tubes ship individually bagged and others don't?
settings.subtitle:
Sustainability is very important to us. However, our number one priority is to provide you with packaging that will stand out on the shelf and help you sell more product. To make that happen, your tubes have to be high-quality and beautiful. That's why some of our ready-made and custom tubes are packed and shipped in individual poly bags.

We've asked our customers and conducted our own extensive research and found that some materials and customization options are more fragile and are susceptible to scuffing and shipping damage during handling and transport. When it comes to our ready-made tubes, we've made a decision to individually bag all white and black tubes. Kraft tubes ship unbagged as the kraft paper surface naturally hides small marks and imperfections. For our custom tubes, we generally bag orders that use uncoated white paper and contain large foil stamped areas.

The bags we use are food safe, certified compostable and biodegradable.

settings.title: Where are the tubes made?
settings.subtitle:
All customer support, design, R&D, and engineering are done in the US at our headquarters just outside of Chicago.

Our dedicated manufacturing facilities, with skilled and highly-trained employees on the ground, are located in China to keep your prices and minimum order quantities low. WeÂ take full ownership of theÂ production process, quality standards, supply chain, and logistics. We hold ourselves and the people we work with to a very high standard and are likely rejecting goods that other suppliers ship to you as passable. We've been told that our quality expectations are higher than Japanese. Google it. Seriously.Â

settings.title: What is your turnaround time?
settings.subtitle:
Pre-made blank stock tubes ship out the next business day. Screen printing on stock tubes takes an additional 2-3 weeks.

For custom orders, initial pre-production prototypes take about 2 weeks to produce. Once approved, mass production lead time is approximately 4-8 weeks, depending on quantity, customization, and order complexity. Shipping times depend on location and shipping method chosen.

settings.title: What are your minimum order quantities?
settings.subtitle:
There is no minimum order quantity for our ready-made stock tubes. Your can purchase 1 or one thousand directly on our website.

Custom tubes that are built from scratch based on your specifications have a minimum order requirement of 1000 or more, depending on the features you need. Talk to one of our packaging consultants and we'll guide you towards the best option.

settings.title: The size/color I need is sold out. When will it be restocked?
settings.subtitle:
We are regularly restocking sold-out SKUs. Chances are it's already on the way to our warehouse. With that said, given the nature of global logistics it's hard to say exactly when it will arrive. Could be weeks or could be months.

If you need something urgently, we probably have another color in the same size in stock. We might also have the color you want but a slightly different size, likely within a quarter inch in height or diameter.

Otherwise, you can always add yourself to the wish list and we'll email you as soon as that product is back in stock.

And one final option, if you need more than 1000 tubes, consider a custom order.

settings.title: What is the process to order custom tubes?
settings.subtitle: Let us know the exact tube dimensions, quantity, and the type of customization you need and we will send you a price quote. We will also send you a design template so you can lay out your artwork.Â When the final artwork is submitted and the order is placed, we will first make pre-production prototypes for your approval. This process takes about 2 weeks. Once approved, mass production lead time is approximately 4-8 weeks, depending on quantity, customization, and order complexity. Shipping times depend on location and shipping method chosen.Â

settings.title: How will my custom order be shipped?
settings.subtitle:
Most custom orders are shipped via Freight services (ocean and air freight). Freight shippingÂ is a completely different process than Small Parcel shipping, which is the standard shipping method used for shipping domestic and international packages. For example, we use UPS Small Parcel services to ship individual stock ready-made orders from our Chicago warehouse to customers in the US and Canada. We also use UPS Small Parcel to ship out samples and prototypes from our office. This type of shipping is usually handled by UPS, FedEx, and USPS. The benefits are: quick delivery, easily trackable, and uses dedicated company fleet (air or ground). The downside of Small Parcel is that it's very expensive on a per kgÂ basis. It is typicallyÂ not used for anything over 150 kg.

Freight shipping, on the other hand, is much less expensive than Small Parcel for large or bulky shipments. The downsides of freight shipping are: variable delivery times and no detailed tracking. Companies like UPS and FedEx also provide freight shipping services, but most of the time they use contractors and partners to transport the goods. For example, a custom order, if shipped by air freight, will get picked up by UPS, get transported to the airport, and will wait for available cargo space on a commercial flight like Cathay Pacific or American Airlines. It will probably go through several stops and possibly multiple flights to make it to the States. Upon arrival at a local airport it will get loaded on a truck contracted by UPS to a third party company like Ruan, who will then deliver it to the destination. Same happens with ocean freight: UPS will arrange a container that will get loaded at our factory and bring it to the port where it will go on a cargo ship operated by someone like Maersk or Hanjin. It will then arrive at the port of entry (usually Long Beach, CA, if shipped to the US) after 3-4 weeks of sailing and will be loaded onto a freight train. The train will deliver the container to a local hub, at which point it will go on a truck for local transport. This kind of inefficiency on the freight side opens up opportunities for other freight companies to compete on cost, or speed of delivery, or other factors. Aside from UPS, we work with several other freight forwarders, all of whom are very competent and cost efficient. They are sometimes able to do things UPS and FedEx cannot as they have relationships with a variety of other companies with better delivery availability.

We will use the best possible option at the time of shipping, depending on shipment size, destination, cost, and many other attributes.Â For more information about shipping see our Shipping 101 blog post.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.subtitle:
You can return unused, non-printed, and undamaged ready-made tubes purchased through our website, within 30 days of delivery. To initiate a return please email the@papertube.co with your order number and what you want to return and we'll provide an RMA number. Ship the tubes back to the address below and write the RMA number on the outside of each carton. Email us the tracking number(s).

MAI
c/o Paper Tube Co (RMA #)
2550 Northwest Pkwy,
Elgin, IL 60124
Tel. 847-802-9868

Once received, we will issue a credit back on the original payment method for the product cost only, minus a 10% restocking fee. Shipping charges are non-refundable.

For custom orders, since all tubes are made to your specifications, we donâ€™t allow returns. However, if youâ€™re unhappy with your order and feel like we didnâ€™t do a great job, please contact us and weâ€™ll do our best to rectify the situation.

settings.title: Do you ship outside of the US?
settings.subtitle: Outside of a few high-fraud-risk countries, we ship globally. Add whatever you need to the shopping cart and go through the checkout process. If we can ship to your destination, shipping options and costs will be displayed and you can complete your order online. Any VAT, customs and import duties are not included and are collected upon delivery, unless pre-paid during the checkout.

settings.title: Can I get a sample?
settings.subtitle:
You most certainly can. If youâ€™re not sure that your product will fit, you can purchase one or several of ourÂ ready-made tubesÂ directly on the website. When you place a larger order, we can credit the cost of the samples, excluding shipping, towards that purchase.

When weâ€™re makingÂ custom tubes, we provide prototypes free of charge after the orders has been placed and artwork has been submitted. These prototypes are used for proofing before we proceed with mass production.

settings.title: Do you offer product insertion and storage/fulfillment services?
settings.subtitle:
We handle everything from design and engineering through manufacturing and shipping. We can design your artwork, engineer custom inserts, manufacture the tubes, warehouse for as long as you need, and drop ship to your fulfillment partner. Think of us as your outsourced in-house packaging department.

Unfortunately, the only thing we don't offer is product insertion.Â That's on you.Â

settings.title: Can I split my order into multiple SKUs or artwork variations?
settings.subtitle: We can split your total order quantity into various artwork versions. In fact, this is something we do on a regular basis for all types of products â€“ teas, candles, bath bombs, skincare and others. Minimum quantity per SKU for custom tubes is 1000 pcs, unless you require advanced customization and extra options...at which point the minimum per SKU is 2500 pcs.Â

settings.title: Can you customize ready-made stock tubes?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we can screen print ready-made tubes using any Pantone color. Please allow 2-3 week production time for any orders that require custom printing.Â

settings.title: What color tubes do you offer?
settings.subtitle: We can make any color you need. Our pre-made stock tubes come in a variety of colors, including black, kraft, white, grey, and some textured finishes. See the Shop section of our website for the entire selection. Additionally, we can produce any Pantone or process color for special orders.Â

settings.title: Are there customization options beyond printing?
settings.subtitle: Definitely! We can do foil stamping, spot UV, embossing and debossing. We can also use a variety of substrates for added effects, as well as die-cuts, windows, inserts, handles and ribbons...but only for custom-made tubes.Â

settings.title: Do you do digital or offset printing?
settings.subtitle: For custom orders, the initial pre-production prototypes are digitally printed in CMYK. Mass production is done using offset equipment. This gives our customers print results that are very high quality and allows us to print on a variety of materials using process and spot colors.

settings.title: What are the payment terms?
settings.subtitle: Stock blank tubes can be ordered directly from the website, are paid in full and shipped immediately. Custom tubes require 50% deposit with balance paid before shipping. Payment terms are available pending credit application approval.Â

settings.title: Can you pre-sell tubes that are out of stock?
settings.subtitle: No, sorry! We have to make sure the product is in our warehouse before we take your money. We cannot hold inventory without payment either. We would be happy to steer you towards a custom order if you need something we donâ€™t have immediately available.Â

settings.title: If I order a second run or additional products, can I get a discount on my subsequent orders?
settings.subtitle: We are very proud of our work and of our relationships with our customers. Pricing is based on tube size, order quantity, and the type of customization. With that said, we work with all reasonable budgets and offer discounts on a case-by-case basis for repeat volume purchases.Â

settings.title: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
settings.subtitle: While we sell direct to end users, we work with many resellers, packaging companies, and promotional products distributors who see value in our products and services. Our prices are based on volume purchases and reseller discounts are provided on a case-by-case basis. Please contact us if you have any questions.Â

settings.title: Philanthropic Initiatives
settings.subtitle: We donate a portion of all proceedsÂ toÂ One Tree Planted,Â a non-profit organization working to reforest the globe. For every $1 we donate, 1 tree gets planted. Our commitment to saving the planet is a lifestyle, and we feel this deed takes our initiative full-circle, as we continue to change the planetÂ one tube at a timeÂ ðŸŒ².

settings.title: Eco-Conscious Packaging
settings.text: According to the EPA, an estimated 14.5 million tons of plastic containers were generated in 2018. Out of that, roughly 70% ended up in the landfill. In some cases it takes plastic up to 500 years to fully decompose. In short, the world is littered with single-use plastic packaging. In comparison, our tubes are made out of 100% paper that biodegrades in natural environment. We also offer other eco-friendly options like soy inks, biodegradable plastic-free linings, and FSC certified paper. Choose earth. Choose paper tubes!

settings.title: Our  Story
settings.content:
Conceived in 2013 when our founder David needed a short-run of unique, ultra-premium packaging for a crucial product launch: it's safe to say Paper Tube Co. was formed out of necessity.

After weeks of fruitless searching, frustrated and unable to find the quality he needed without overpaying on an excessive minimum quantity, David made the decision to venture the path of manufacturing tubes on his own, and thus ... Paper Tube Co. was born.

Today, just as it was in our start-up years, the goal is simple. We help authentic companies thrive in a crowded marketplace through eco-friendly packaging that gets noticed, elevates the unboxing experience, and sells more product

settings.title: Core Values
settings.content:
We help authentic companies thrive in a crowded marketplace through eco-friendly packaging that gets noticed, elevates the unboxing experience, and sells more product. Here are the values we live and work by.

Integrity

We are trustworthy and dependable. We take responsibility, hold ourselves accountable, and do whatâ€™s right. Even in tough situations. Even when no one is watching. We know who we are and who weâ€™re not. If we think we can do it, we'll tell you. If we think we can't, we'll tell you also. We treat people like we want to be treated. We manage expectations. We under-promise and over-deliver.

Competence

We are experts. Our customers rely on our knowledge and expertise to succeed in their business and industry. We'll drive the bus and take ownership. We know where weâ€™re going and whatâ€™s best for our customers. We are results oriented, but process focused. All internal and external procedures are engineered with defined goals in mind. We are driven, self motivated and self managed. We hold our supply-chain and manufacturing partners, and our own staff to the highest standards.

Curiosity

We are naturally curious. We are geeks and tinkerers. We break things to figure out how they work, and how we can make them better. We have a thirst for knowledge, that we want to pass on to others. We get to the root of the problem. We think critically. We ask the right questions at the right moment.

Quality

We provide outstanding, high-quality products that deliver exceptional value to our customers. We are on a relentless pursuit of excellence. We are proud of our work. We deliver a great experience at every interaction. We are easy to work with and buy from.

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more â€¦

settings.paragraph_content:
The cannabis business is booming. With legalization sweeping around the world, this is the industry to join. Being that CBD is legal, even in states where cannabis is not, it's the top market to take advantage of. All of which means, the competition is fierce, and rapidly growing. Additionally, CBD takes shape in a numerous amount of forms, including cosmetics, food, beverage, and everything in between. With this in mind, one must make their brand glaringly significant.

Diem CBD’s brand identity is funky and bold. Their color story and artwork demand attention, so when added to paper tubes, it’s a match made in heaven. Diem’s product selection features the essentials and their packaging presents that in a minimally effective manner. These choices reflect positively on their ability to stand out in an overcrowded market. Not to mention, with tubes so unique, customers will most likely hang onto them, exponentially growing the impact of their brand for years to come. Not only does this reduce waste and help the environment, but it’s great free marketing.

settings.paragraph_content:
Handmade products are a special category of goods. These products are often personal to the creators and their packaging usually has just as much heart. Keeping with the theme of their homestyle nature, Wildflower Caramels went with a traditional kraft, ready-made tube. Screen printing their logo on the cap, the design of their packaging exudes a feel-good attitude that coincides with their market.

Ready-made tubes and screen printing are great options for brands with smaller batches of product, offering the chance to customize but with a lower minimum and cost. With the addition of a label, Wildflower’s finished product fits in seamlessly with the rest of their existing collection. Having initially started with bags, they wanted to add tubes as a premium gift option for their most popular selection of caramels. This simple touch of tube packaging elevates their individually-wrapped treats into the perfect gift, with no wrapping necessary.

settings.title: Eco-Friendly
settings.text: 100% recyclable and reusable. Reduce your eco-footprint with our biodegradable paper tube packaging.

settings.paragraph_content:
When selling a premium item, the packaging needs to showcase in the correct way, but also match quality-wise. Tono & Co accomplished just that with their soft-touch tubes, featuring a die-cut that shows a glimpse of material and color. With hints of gold foil, the packaging offers a lux shell for their high quality silk scarves. 

Before consumers are even able to feel and view the product, they start the experience with luxurious, elegant packaging, which sets up the brand for success from the get-go. Every facet of your product experience should exude the feeling and quality you want to represent.

settings.title: Stand Out With Premium Packaging
settings.subtitle: We're more than just tubes. We're packaging engineers. Elevate your brand, enhance the unboxing experience, and sell more products with premium paper packaging.

settings.title: Folding Retail Boxes
settings.text: Not ready for tubes yet? That's cool. How about premium quality folding cartons? Think of them as square tubes.

settings.title: Rigid Gift Boxes
settings.text: For when presentation matters! Perfect for gift sets and luxury product display. Magnets, inserts, sleeves, pure opulence. Need we say more?

settings.title: Corrugated Mailers
settings.text: Everything your little direct-to-consumer-brand heart desires. Make custom corrugated mailers your perfect shipping companion.

settings.title: Paper Envelopes & Pouches
settings.text: Recyclable, biodegradable, certified sustainable bundles of papery goodness. Tough enough for shipping. Light enough for guilt-free usage.

settings.title: Shopping Bags
settings.text: So you have a retail location, eh? And you want some brand consistency, don't you? High-end shopping bags is a good place to start.

settings.title: Need Something Else?
settings.text: Yes, we do do custom packaging development, and we're damn good at it. Our award-winning, patented, sustainable packaging is used across every industry, by brands big and small. It can be found on the shelves of big-box retailers, in the hands of celebrities, and in the shopping carts of your customers. Request a quote and let's get your project started today.

settings.title: Designed & Engineered to Grab Attention
settings.subtitle: From structural engineering to graphic design, from custom development through prototyping, our creative team is here to drive your packaging project from start to finish. Always on time and on budget!

settings.title: Structural Engineering
settings.text: We go beyond dieline creation. Need help with product fit, custom inserts, superb unboxing experience? We do all that and more! Send us your product, and we'll do the rest.

settings.title: Design & Brand Identity
settings.text: Not sure where to start with the artwork and looking for a creative team? Our award-winning designers will craft the perfect packaging for your brand! Request a consultation today.

settings.title: R&D & Prototyping
settings.text: Need help developing something special? Maybe something that doesn't exist yet? We're experts at working with all materials and production methods. We'll help you test out your idea, prototype it, and optimize it for mass manufacturing.

settings.paragraph_content: Approximately 4.79 billion retail prescriptions will be filled this year, most using child-proof plastic bottles. Add to that the excessive packaging often used to keep cannabis safe and fresh and youâ€™ve got an astronomical number of opportunities for retailers to pivot toward a more sustainable choice. Thankfully, the Paper Tube Co. research and development team has created an eco-friendly solution.

settings.content: The EcoVaultÂ® product line replaces plastic pill bottles traditionally used by the pharmaceutical, supplement, and cannabis industries with paper bottles, designed to be universally compatible with all major cap sizes on the market. An innovative threaded adaptor makes this possible and the EcoVaultÂ® catalog makes it easy to trigger a culture switch, turning the tide toward a more sustainable future.

settings.paragraph_content:

â—† Works with industry-standard CR and non-CR threaded caps
â—† Threaded adapter can be produced in PP, ABS, PHA, and any other injection-molded material
â—† Customizable Height (no tooling required)
â—† Customizable Diameter (required tooling)

Looking for a way to show environmentally-conscious customers you care? Introducing a 100% recyclable, refillable alternative to wasteful plastic deodorant tubes. Our completely customizable case is durable enough to withstand the most rigorous lifestyle. Whether your customer is tossing it in the gym bag daily, traveling, or simply stowing it in the medicine cabinet, our high-quality, eco-friendly paper tube is your best alternative to single-use plastic beauty/cosmetics/personal care containers.

settings.content: Weâ€™ve made it easy for you to bring your product into the reusable, plastic-free market. The durable reusable case is ready for your companyâ€™s brand, and biodegradable 2 oz. paper refill cartridges are ready for your product. Simply brand, formulate, and launch.
